review_data.title: Very good service.
review_data.content: Prompt delivery. Warm and tasty food. Friendly staff. Contactless and good conformity to COVID 19 regulations. I’ll order food again here.

review_data.title: Highly recommend Thali
review_data.content: We had Thali delivery and the food was delicious and delivered hot! The vindaloo was perfectly spicy and we loved every dish we ordered. Definitely highly recommend Thali!

review_data.title: excellent
review_data.content: repas excellent, très bonne cuisine, je recommande vraiment cet endroit agreable et sympathique, un des meilleurs pour moi sur zurich.

review_data.title: Bleib weg! Nein in der Nähe von indischem Essen.
review_data.content: Es ist rein stumpf ohne Gewürze, das Schlimmste, das ich jemals in letzter Zeit hatte, Bleib weg, Bleib weg!

review_data.title: avoid
review_data.content: being an Indian myself and knowing the flavors.. i would never recommend this place. There are better... hmm.. restaurants around.

review_data.title: A Great Neighborhood Spot!
review_data.content: This is our kind of place. Very, very simple, very, very clean, great food! Thali Indian has a lovely buffet with enough choices to meet our needs, all fresh and well seasoned. When an Indian restaurant cooks the rice perfectly, I know they are taking...More

review_data.title: Very Good Food
review_data.content: The ambience was nice. The people were friendly and helping. Baby friendly. To go place for Indian Food in Zürich.

review_data.title: Recommended Indian Restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: Had lunch there. Staff was nice and soft spoken. Food was good and tastes like authentic home made Indian food. Though felt a little overpriced considering the quantity of portions in Thali. Recommended.

review_data.title: Tasteless food !
review_data.content: After a hectic day-long trip, WE thought of picking-up Indian dish for dinner. Requested a takeaway for chicken biryani. It took 25~30minutes to pack. But, when we opened the packet ... surprised to see biryani served with moong dal & raita. Talking about the taste...More

review_data.title: Lunch on Saturday
review_data.content: People were so kind That didn't reflect much on food. Have been for weekday lunches and was good. But weekend lunch was not good. Good people and nice place.

review_data.title: Pretty good
review_data.content: Our group arrived a little late in the evening for dinner. There were no other guests so we had a relaxed dinner. The seating was a little cramped but still okay. The food was good. Much better than other Indian restaurants.

review_data.title: Value for money
review_data.content: It is about 4 stops by tram from central Zurich station area. A local person recommended this. We had prawn pakoda as starter and it was absolutely fantastic. The other regular Indian food that we ordered was all upto the mark. We witnessed lot of...More

review_data.title: Indian Take Away
review_data.content: Sehr leckers und authentisches Essen. Grosse Portionen zu fairem Preis. Freundliche Bedienung. Wir kommen gerne wieder!

review_data.title: Good food and super nice service
review_data.content: The food is delicious, freshly made and they offer a lot of different vegetarian food options. It is also possible to take the food away and eat it outside.

review_data.title: Delicious Food at this little Gem of a restaurant

review_data.title: Feiner Start ins 2019
review_data.content: Kleines aber feines indisches Buffet. Als Getränk ist original indisches Kingfisher Bier erhältlich. Am Tisch gegessen mit Bier und Nachschlag...More

review_data.title: Superb food we ordered online
review_data.content: The food was really good especially aloo mutter. The dhal was without too much oil and very tasty. Raita was out of the world. The food though we ordered came very hot. Next time surely will go to the resturant

review_data.title: Mittagsbuffet ok jedoch starker Geruch der Kleider nach dem Besuch

review_data.title: Authentic indian food
review_data.content: The food is authentic and very good. The owners are really nice people and they know how to welcome his clients. I would definitely go back there.

review_data.title: Naja

review_data.title: Super indisch und sehr nette Bedingung

review_data.title: Lecker
review_data.content: Aufgrund einer Weiterbildung in Zürich gehen wir oft Essen ist und testen gerne alles aus. Super netter Service hinter der...More

review_data.title: Favourit Indian kitchen in town
review_data.content: The interior really doesn't suit the food, but the authentic service, kitchen and even plates to some dishes make it a please to visit over and over again

review_data.title: Great food at a great price!
review_data.content: Stopped in for lunch. Food was very good and reasonably priced. All the items in Thali were fresh and the dishes had the taste of home-made food. The staff were very friendly and welcoming.

review_data.title: Authentic Indian Restaurant

review_data.title: Great takeaway with friendly service
review_data.content: Great takeaway with a good selection and always prepared fresh. Very friendly service which will do everything to make you happy :-) thumbs up

review_data.title: Best home like buffet food!!!!!

review_data.title: Just that a Indian looks for on foreign land
review_data.content: Were in Zurich on 16 June 2018, after a long search for an Indian restaurant open on a weekend (Saturday) afternoon we found this right place. Food was authentic and there was sincere effort to provide a truely tasty Indian fool exactly the way it...More

review_data.title: Always happy to return
review_data.content: If eating Indian in Zurich,Thali is always my first choice. Both the food and the service are very authentic and the price is fair!

review_data.title: Wonderful Indian Restaurant
review_data.content: I visited here with my wife while I was on a work related trip to Zurich from Amsterdam. I was really not expecting such great food, so friendly owners and staff, at such reasonable prices. the ambiance of the restaurant is really good. The owners...More

review_data.title: Nothing to repeat
review_data.content: Went there for some dal and rice, not the most special dish but I ate vegetarian that day. It was actually quite boring, it tasted that it got cooked the whole day and you have drunk it as it so loose.

review_data.title: Bridge Holiday Visit to Zurich
review_data.content: 1. Excellent veg food, family friendly atmosphere, helpful staff 2. Specialist in north indian food 3. Buffet, Al a carte, Take away...all options are available 4. Mango lassi and palak paneer (tofu) are delicious 5. Close to main station, 15 min by tram On the...More

review_data.title: Great food.
review_data.content: This feels more like a takeaway than a restaurant, but they do have tables. The decor could do with some attention, nevertheless we had an awesome meal (butter chicken & masala chicken) with great Indian beer, delicious garlic naan and raita. Friendly service !

review_data.title: Amazing food

review_data.title: Nice food
review_data.content: Nice food and friendly staff, we had veg food. It was fairly good. We asked extra spice they did it without any hesitation.

review_data.title: Hi
review_data.content: No comment about the food! Excellent! And very nice service, welcoming people! I definitely recommend it for everyone!

review_data.title: Excellent lamb biryani. Halal
review_data.content: I was happy with the taste of the food. Staff were very friendly. Will definitely recommend my friends and family to visit this hotel. Lamb biryani was really tasty and fair pricing too.

review_data.title: Great food at a fair price
review_data.content: Food was very good, compared to other Indian restaurants in Zürich fairly priced. Good portions and large naan bread.

review_data.title: Great food , must try
review_data.content: Very tasty and authentic food , served with excellent hospitality. Convenient location near main station.

review_data.title: Delicious food.

review_data.title: Food is OK, servers are not interested at all !

review_data.title: Amazing food!
review_data.content: Came here more times and always the food was more than amazing!!!! The prices are normal for zurich and the quality is exceptional!! This is an indian must in Zurich.

review_data.title: veg take away
review_data.content: great food very mildly spiced especially palak paneer ..daal was fine..quantity was bit conservative...otherwise, great food...at this price..didnot check the indian breads so canot say much..

review_data.title: Good food but service needs improvement
review_data.content: Visited once during my stay in Zurich. The restaurant is run by a Punjabi(Indian) family. review_data.title: Service friendly good food

review_data.title: Superfein, gerne wieder
review_data.content: Einfache Atmosphäre, dafür herziger Empfang und superfeines Essen. Einmal durch Zufall gefunden, jetzt kommen wir alle gerne regelmässig.

review_data.title: Great and economical food
review_data.content: For Indian food lovers this is place to be and great food you get and in proper Indian thali style. It's run by Punjabi family and was literally equivalent to home made Indian food. Must try.

review_data.title: Really tasty Avial and Palak Paneer
review_data.content: We noticed this small restaurant while passing on the tram #14, and in an effort to limit spending on food we stopped here. Although twice the cost in similar restaurant in Europe, it's still a bargain in pricey Zürich. Take out is available.

review_data.title: Decent Indian buffet takeaway/cafe

review_data.title: Decent indian food
review_data.content: The place offered decent indian food. We were able to get dinner buffet on one day due to some large group reservation. The ala-carte items are decent but a bit pricey for the quality.

review_data.title: letzter Besuch

review_data.title: Das beste indische Essen in Zürich

review_data.title: Good value

review_data.title: Good Indian food in Zurich, slightly expensive

review_data.title: Gutes Essen, freundliche Bedienung
review_data.content: Einfach eingerichtet, aber sehr gutes Essen und ausgesprochen freundliche Bedienung. Werde sicher auch bald vom Lieferservice Gebrauch machen.

review_data.title: Gut und Günstig indisch
review_data.content: Einfache Atmosphäre jedoch preigünstig und gut. Freundliche Bedienung. Mittagsbuffet mit Fleisch und Vegi. Grosse Portionen!

review_data.title: Very tasty but not cheap
review_data.content: They serve good food and service is friendly. However, I have had better Indian food in a nicer location in Zurich for less money.

review_data.title: Leckeres Mittagsbuffet

review_data.title: Tasty food but ugly place

review_data.title: Thali Indian Restaurant in Zurich excellent food and great service!!!!! Must visit!!!
review_data.content: First time in Europe we found an authentic Indian Restaurant with authentic home made food. review_data.title: Indian Thali with good service
review_data.content: It is nice Indian taste food with good service in reasonable price. Hindi songs were played at the restaurant. :) There were many guests other than Indian people who were enjoying the food.

review_data.title: Good Fresh Indian Food

review_data.title: Lovely Food with Smiles !!

review_data.title: Close zurich city center

review_data.title: Delicious Indian food
review_data.content: Very tasty Indian food the chicken curry & dalh was delicious. The owners went out of their way to accommodate us even when they were fully booked👍🏻

review_data.title: Just Indian food

review_data.title: Good, inexpensive place to eat if you like curries
review_data.content: Good, authentic Indian food is considerably better than many of its nearby competitors. As spicy as you want. Not at all expensive, which can be useful in Zurich. They'll serve a veggie curry to take away for as little as CHF 10.

review_data.title: Great food, super friendly staff and owners
review_data.content: Simple, quick, but very good! Execlent curry, great nun bread. Owners and staff went out there way to make us feel at home. Would def come back if in Zurich

review_data.title: Serive is the main thing to call person again
review_data.content: I went there for buffet . The food was good and songs were good too and atmosphere was not that good but still ok but the service was best . I will recomend you to make little decoration . But all was good.

review_data.title: Little India Thali
review_data.content: Mr. Singh gave us a great party with wonderful Punjabi authentic food. There is enough place for 30 or 40 people, including a little summer terrace behind the building so not on the main road. Also the Chai is very recommended.

review_data.title: Excellent!!

review_data.title: Excellent food at a reasonable price
